column4: kde has a koiisk feature. and theres several firefox koisk extensions

what game.. You probely RUN the insaller. not mount it.
you mean to say  its an image of a windows game cd?
yes
close all programs accessing the cdrom - or it wont unmount
it is instalation in progres requesting cd2 :D
let me guess.. some stupid game with wine?
correct!:)
for wine/games/multi-cd i tend to copy ALL the files from both cd's (or more) to a single dir, then use wine and start the installer from that directory.
somehow game dont work if installing from hdd
check the wine app database then - they may have a fix.
it is ok, now, it unmounted after 5 min :)
what game is this anyway?
codemasters: operation flashpoint
that a first person shooter? military?  I seem to recall that game.
yes , big battlefield :) check on http://hotshots.folkersma.org
i seem to recall getting shot by the bad guys from 1000000000 miles away between buildings, while i was hiding in a bush.. in that game WAY too many times..
yes, AI can be modified to be Rambo like there ;) one guy spot u , next kill you
I think my friend even gave up on it. heh
the ai needed work just to even make it playable from what we thought. :) but i dont even know where my copy of the game is any ,ore
yes is old game , not many ppl play. we play only one mod created by players, somthing like C/C renagde on battleffield
